_all_product_from_cart_fetch_successfull: All product from cart fetch successfully
_product_is_not_exist_with_this_uuid_: Product is not exist with this uuid
_product_is_already_exist_in_cart_: Product is already exist in cart
_we_could_not_find_what_you_are_looking_: We could not find what you are looking for.
_error_while_adding_product_to_cart_: Error while adding product in cart
_error_while_removing_product_from_cart_: Error while removing product from cart
